title: Vijay Prashad: Noam Chomsky, Israel, Palestine, US, China, Venezuela, DRC, Bangladesh, Cuba, & Left.
description:

In this show, we ask Vijay Prashad about his recent take on Palestine, especially the attempts made by China to bring different Palestinian political groups together. We have also asked Vijay on his latest book on Cuba, co-authored with Noam Chomsky. We have discussed Venezuela in the context of the recent election. We asked him for his take on the recent developments in Bangladesh after the fall of the Awami League government. We have discussed the new dossier by Vijay and others in the Democratic Republic of Congo. And we end this conversation with a discussion on nuclear proliferation in the context of Pacific islands.
